title: Anchor man
brief_description: Describes how the Royal Australian Navy trains reservists as part-time sailors. They train once a week and receive two weeks full time training at sea where they learn the skills needed to man a Defense craft. They would back up the permanent servicemen in the event of hostile action. No other credits available.
